official_title: A bill to increase the authorization of appropriations for the development of the William Howard Taft National Historic Site, Ohio, and to change the boundaries of such site.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the development of the William Howard Taft National Historic Site, Ohio, and changes the boundaries of such site.

titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization of appropriations for the development of the William Howard Taft National Historic Site, Ohio, and to change the boundaries of such site.
